ai4materials.models.cnn_nature_comm_ziletti2018 module¶

ai4materials.models.cnn_nature_comm_ziletti2018.load_nature_comm_ziletti2018_network()[source]¶

Load the Keras neural network model to classify two-dimensional diffraction fingerprints introduced in Ref. [R3]

Returns:

keras.models.Model object
Return the Keras model from the reference mentioned above.
[R3]A. Ziletti, D. Kumar, M. Scheffler, and L. M. Ghiringhelli, “Insightful classification of crystal structures using deep learning”, Nature Communications, vol. 9, pp. 2775 (2018)

Code author: Angelo Ziletti <angelo.ziletti@gmail.com>

ai4materials.models.cnn_nature_comm_ziletti2018.normalize_images(images)[source]¶
ai4materials.models.cnn_nature_comm_ziletti2018.predict(x, y, configs, numerical_labels, text_labels, nb_classes=7, results_file=None, model=None, batch_size=32, show_model_acc=True, conf_matrix_file=None, verbose=1)[source]¶

Predict the class of crystal structures represented with the two-dimensional diffraction fingerprints.

This model was introduced in Ref. [R4]:

Returns:

keras.models.Model object
Return the Keras model from the reference mentioned above.
[R4]A. Ziletti, D. Kumar, M. Scheffler, and L. M. Ghiringhelli, “Insightful classification of crystal structures using deep learning”, Nature Communications, vol. 9, pp. 2775 (2018)

Code author: Angelo Ziletti <angelo.ziletti@gmail.com>

ai4materials.models.cnn_nature_comm_ziletti2018.reshape_images_to_theano(images)[source]¶
ai4materials.models.cnn_nature_comm_ziletti2018.train_neural_network(x_train, y_train, x_val, y_val, configs, partial_model_architecture, batch_size=32, nb_epoch=5, normalize=True, checkpoint_dir=None, neural_network_name='my_neural_network', training_log_file='training.log', early_stopping=False)[source]¶

Train a neural network to classify crystal structures represented as two-dimensional diffraction fingerprints.

This model was introduced in [R5].

x_train: np.array, [batch, width, height, channels]

[R5]A. Ziletti, D. Kumar, M. Scheffler, and L. M. Ghiringhelli, “Insightful classification of crystal structures using deep learning”, Nature Communications, vol. 9, pp. 2775 (2018)

Code author: Angelo Ziletti <angelo.ziletti@gmail.com>
